sources.title: Bloodlust!
sources.description: A group of teenagers lands on an island owned by a man who hunts people for sport. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page . This was featured as episode 0607 of Mystery Science Theater 3000. You can find a WMV of this movie here .

sources.title: Bloodlust! (1961)
sources.description: Two couples are on a boating trip when they come across an uncharted island. The four investigate and find themselves in the clutches of Dr. Albert Balleau, whose hobby is hunting both animals and humans… The group tries to escape only to be thwarted by Dr. Balleau and his henchmen. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/bloodlust-1961/

sources.title: Bloodlust!
sources.description: Title: Bloodlust! Summary: A crazed hunter kidnaps people and turns them loose on his private estate, where he hunts them for sport. Directed by: Ralph Brooke Actors: Wilton Graff, June Kenney, Walter Brooke Production Company: cinegrafik Release Date: 13 September 1961 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A group of teen-agers vacationing in the tropics take a boat out to a seemingly deserted island. They soon find, however, that the island is inhabited by a wealthy recluse and his staff. While their host is initially hospitable, he quickly reveals his true purpose: to hunt down and kill each of his visitors, as he has done with everyone unlucky enough to set foot on his island.

sources.title: Bloodlust! (1961) HORROR
sources.description:
Stars: Wilton Graff, June Kenney, Walter Brooke 
 Writer/Director: Ralph Brooke

 A crazed hunter kidnaps people and turns them loose on his private estate, where he hunts them for sport. A Re-telling of the classic "The Most Dangerous Game."

metadata.Plot: A group of teen-agers vacationing in the tropics take a boat out to a seemingly deserted island. They soon find, however, that the island is inhabited by a wealthy recluse and his staff. While their host is initially hospitable, he quickly reveals his true purpose: to hunt down and kill each of his visitors, as he has done with everyone unlucky enough to set foot on his island.
metadata.Actors: Wilton Graff, June Kenney, Walter Brooke
